Html:
Hi Guys,

I am new to Prism and would like to start using the technologies for a new "Silverlight 3" project.

I have the following questions -

1.  I attempted to download the Composite Application Guidance - Oct 2009 but it did not seem to contain the Prism related binaries. So where is the best place to get the binaries?

2.  When browsing the source I see a V1, V2 and V3 folder. Which version is most mature and compatible with Silverlight 3?

3.  Should I just download the binaries from the Vx branch or should I download the source and compile locally?

Thanks in advance,

Tarek

Hi Guys,

I found this excellent blog that help me answer my questions -

http://www.sparklingclient.com/prism-silverlight/

Kind Regards,

Tarek
